QuestData.Title: The Book of Fel Names
QuestData.Description: I sympathize with your intentions of stopping Varedis and his followers, but you won't stand a chance against him. That is, unless you find the artifact that gave him his power.$B$BThe Book of Fel Names is rumored to be in the possession of Blackheart the Inciter inside the Shadow Labyrinth in Auchindoun. Obtaining it will be your only hope against Varedis.
QuestData.LogDescription: Venture inside the Shadow Labyrinth in Auchindoun and obtain the Book of Fel Names from Blackheart the Inciter. Return to Altruis in Nagrand once you've completed this task.
QuestData.RewardText: I was able to sense the book's power from yards away. The temptation to keep it is... very strong.
